title: Ep 471 | Jase Fires Off a Hilarious Missy Story & Duck Dynasty Causes an Unspeakable Burning Feeling
description:
Jase is filled to the brim with non-stop stories to share, including rope swing memories, a failed first date, a funny story about Missy, and a film crew's first exposure to ants. Al and Jase discuss the creative process of just being vulnerable and being yourself instead of faking it for TV. Phil and Jase explain the only time when it is OK to boast about anything, and Phil talks about the world's attempt to invent a standard to make ourselves good enough for love. And Al says it's best not to make it difficult for people to speak at your funeral.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://BuyRaycon.com/Unashamed and get 15% off your Mother's Day order

Visit https://PatriotMobile.com/PHIL and use code: PHIL and get free activation
